name: Anyplace Werewolf party app. Werewolf \ Mafia game
name_original: Anyplace Werewolf party app. Werewolf \ Mafia game
description:
Anyplace WEREWOLF will completely substitute a set of cards for playing WEREWOLF card game (party game). Play Mafia in any place and any time!

1. Simple interface!  
Start the game in just 10 seconds – just press “Quick start” and set the number of players. Players will understand their roles by taking device and opening their card in the app.

  2. For any kind of rules of Werewolf party game!
 You can create any needed game characters and set how many of them should be in the game. 

3. Opportunity to customize! 
You have the opportunity to change basic deck of cards to another one, drawn in different and unique style!

4. Timer for game master.
Will help to manage the game and makes it easier and more organized!

You no longer need cards, pen & paper or Werewolf game set.  Anyplace Werewolf in your device will substitute all these things.
You will also save money as our app is much cheaper than usual Werewolf party game set.

Environment friendly!
You will also help to preserve world ecology by saving paper and other materials needed to produce cards and other stuff needed for Werewolf game set.
